attributes.action: Rehouse homeless British Ex military before refugees are given homes in the UK.
attributes.background: Up to 9,000 British heroes who served Queen and country are homeless after leaving the military, a Sunday Mirror investigation reveals today. Shockingly, ex-service personnel account for one in 10 rough sleepers across the UK.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107425

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
